    Methods in com.github.bhlangonijr.chesslib with parameters of type Board
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    MoveBackup.makeBackup(Board board, Move move)
    Initiates a new move backup, possibly overwriting any previously existing backup.
    void
    MoveBackup.restore(Board board)
    Restores the previously stored status backup to the board passed as an argument, effectively cancelling the consequences of the move memorized at the time the backup was created, as well as any potential move executed on the board after that moment.
    Constructors in com.github.bhlangonijr.chesslib with parameters of type Board

    Description

    MoveList.decodeSan(Board board, String san, Side side)
    Converts a move defined by its Short Algebraic Notation (SAN) to an instance of Move, using the given board and side as context.
    static void
    MoveGenerator.generateBishopMoves(Board board, List<Move> moves)
    Generates all bishop moves for the playing side in the given position, and appends them to the list passed as an argument.
    static void
    MoveGenerator.generateBishopMoves(Board board, List<Move> moves, long mask)
    Generates all bishop moves for the playing side in the given position, according to a bitboard mask used to specify the allowed target squares on the board.

    static List<Move>
    MoveGenerator.generateLegalMoves(Board board)
    Returns the list of all possible legal moves for the position according to the standard rules of chess.
    static void
    MoveGenerator.generatePawnCaptures(Board board, List<Move> moves)
    Generates all pawn captures for the playing side in the given position, and appends them to the list passed as an argument.
    static void
    MoveGenerator.generatePawnMoves(Board board, List<Move> moves)
    Generates all pawn moves, excluding captures, for the playing side in the given position, and appends them to the list passed as an argument.
    static List<Move>
    MoveGenerator.generatePseudoLegalCaptures(Board board)
    Returns the list of all possible pseudo-legal captures for the given position.
    static List<Move>

    Returns the list of all possible pseudo-legal moves for the given position.
